column2: Step upon the main stage and memorize the routine for the big dance number.
Memorize the routine of the Lords and Ladies of the Dance and flawlessly perform on cue ten moves or more.
Step upon the main stage and test your wits against Typhon\xe2\x94\x80snorter extraordinaire. Can you remain on the dais until time expires, or will you find yourself gone with the wind?
Anticipate where Typhon's next nasal eruption will occur and maneuver to a location where you think you will be safe.
A wicked imp has taken on the form of an upstanding Gold Saucer patron and is hiding somewhere on the premises. Locate the GATE client's exact double and deliver it a healthy dose of brightash.
Follow all the race trainer's instructions.
Mini Cactpot rules are simple. First, you select three numbers from the eight hidden on your ticket. Next, you select one of eight lines\xe2\x94\x80vertical, horizontal, or diagonal.
Once you've selected a line, all the numbers are uncovered with the sum of the three in the line you chose determining your MGP payout. It's that easy!

Now all that's left is to select a four-digit number. The winning number will be selected at a later date. If the last digit of your number matches the winning number, you win 4th prize. If the last two match, you win 3rd prize. If the last three match, you win 2nd, and if all your numbers match, you take home the grand prize.
